name: Mega Man Legends Punt or Pet
name_original: Mega Man Legends Punt or Pet
description:
Originally created in 2011 to help raise awareness for the Mega Man Legends 3 Project, I have remade "Mega Man Legends: Punt or Pet" for a new age. It's now HTML5 and designed for play on a smartphone!

While the 3DS demo for Mega Man Legends 3 never came out, there's always new ways to show your support for the Mega Man Legends series. Make fan art, fan games, fan music, and let Capcom know you want to see more Mega Man Legends! Linked below is one way to show support easily; the composer behind Mega Man Legends asking for retweets to see how many people are interested in the series!

http://www.rockman-corner.com/2020/06/mega-man-legends-composer-is.html
